title: Второе и компот
overview: Let's taste history! Weekly culinary and historical detective story. How were gastronomic masterpieces created? How did you get to Russia? Each recipe has a fascinating story. Together with the host Vladimir Raevsky, we will walk through the streets of Moscow, find places that are associated with this or that recipe, collect artifacts, and visit famous chefs and historians. Let's prepare a dish according to a historical recipe and compare it with a modern one. We will talk about juicy traditions and intense competition - in detail and richly.
